00068 struct pool
00069 {
00070         typedef boost::singleton_pool<pool, sizeof(char)> pool_t;
00071 
00072         typedef std::list< numeric::interval<long>, fast_pool_allocator< numeric::interval<long> > > pool_lii;  
00074 #ifndef BOOST_DISABLE_THREADS
00075     static thread_specific_ptr<pool_lii> & plii()    
00076     {
00077         static thread_specific_ptr<pool_lii> plii_;
00078         
00079         return plii_;
00080     }
00081 #else
00082     static std::auto_ptr<pool_lii> & plii()          
00083     {
00084         static std::auto_ptr<pool_lii> plii_;
00085         
00086         return plii_;
00087     }
00088 #endif
00089 
00097         static bool is_from(void * p)
00098         {
00099                 return pool_t::is_from(p);
00100         }
00101         
00102         static void init()
00103         {
00104             if (plii().get() == 0)
00105                 plii().reset(new pool_lii());
00106         }
00107         
00115     static block_base * top(void * p)
00116     {
00117         init();
00118         
00119         pool_lii::reverse_iterator i;
00120         
00121         for (i = plii()->rbegin(); i != plii()->rend(); i ++)
00122             if (in((long)(p), * i))
00123                 break;
00124 
00125         plii()->erase(i.base(), plii()->end());
00126         
00127         return (block_base *)(plii()->rbegin()->lower());
00128     }
00129     
00130         
00138     static void * allocate(std::size_t s)
00139     {
00140         init();
00141         
00142         void * p = pool_t::ordered_malloc(s);
00143         
00144         plii()->push_back(numeric::interval<long>((long) p, long((char *)(p) + s)));
00145         
00146         return p;
00147     }
00148 
00149         
00157     static void deallocate(void * p, std::size_t s)
00158     {
00159         init();
00160         
00161         pool_lii::reverse_iterator i;
00162         
00163         for (i = plii()->rbegin(); i != plii()->rend(); i ++)
00164             if (in((long)(p), * i))
00165                 break;
00166 
00167         plii()->erase(i.base(), plii()->end());
00168         pool_t::ordered_free(p, s);
00169     }
00170 };

00177 class block_base : public sp_counted_base
00178 {
00179 public:
00180     bool init_;                                                                         
00182         intrusive_stack ptrs_;                                                  
00183         intrusive_list inits_;                                                  
00185     intrusive_list::node block_tag_;                                    
00186     intrusive_list::node init_tag_;                                     
00188     block_base() : init_(false)
00189     {
00190         inits_.push_back(& init_tag_); 
00191     }
00192 
00193 protected:
00194     virtual void dispose()                                                  {}                          
00195     virtual void * get_deleter( std::type_info const & ti ) { return 0; }       
00196 };

00199 #define TEMPLATE_DECL(z, n, text) BOOST_PP_COMMA_IF(n) typename T ## n
00200 #define ARGUMENT_DECL(z, n, text) BOOST_PP_COMMA_IF(n) T ## n const & t ## n
00201 #define PARAMETER_DECL(z, n, text) BOOST_PP_COMMA_IF(n) t ## n
00202 
00203 #define CONSTRUCT_BLOCK(z, n, text)                                                                                                                                                         \
00204         template <BOOST_PP_REPEAT(n, TEMPLATE_DECL, 0)>                                                                                                 \
00205                 text(BOOST_PP_REPEAT(n, ARGUMENT_DECL, 0)) : elem_(BOOST_PP_REPEAT(n, PARAMETER_DECL, 0)) {}

00211 template <typename T>
00212     class block : public block_base
00213     {
00214         typedef T data_type;
00215 
00216         T elem_;                                                                        
00218     public:
00219         class roofof;
00220         friend class roofof;
00221 
00222                 block() : elem_() 
00223         {
00224         }
00225 
00226         BOOST_PP_REPEAT_FROM_TO(1, 10, CONSTRUCT_BLOCK, block)
00227 
00228 
00229                 
00233         data_type * element()                           { return & elem_; }
00234 
00235         virtual ~block()                                        
00236         { 
00237             dispose(); 
00238         }
00239 
00240     public:
00245         class roofof
00246         {
00247             block * p_;                                                 
00249         public:
00256             roofof(data_type * p) : p_(bp::roofof((data_type block::*)(& block::elem_), p)) {}
00257             
00258                         
00263             operator block * () const { return p_; }
00264         };
00265 
00266         
00274         void * operator new (size_t s)
00275         {
00276             return pool::allocate(s);
00277         }
00278         
00279 
00286         void operator delete (void * p)
00287         {
00288             pool::deallocate(p, sizeof(block));
00289         }
00290     };

00300         block();
00301 
00302     public:
